topic.title: Tribler, Tor, Zeronet
topic.body:
Hi all!!
I have a question : Do Zeronet in on the network Tor or work in own tor ?
I discovered Tribler and work with Tor but not in network Tor, only network Tribler with technology Tor.
I think it's better. No ??
https://www.tribler.org

topic.title: ZeroBlog to clone wich work with ID@ZeroVerse & ZeroID
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Pmbjf4riKFVpH4cfdVfubdN7SfRCfGGea
Name : ZeroBlog V1.0 (ZI & ZV)
How this ZeroBlog was created :
.1. It's a ZeroBlog cloned (http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit)
.2. 3 files were modified :
data\Name'sZeroBlog\data\users\content.json
data\Name'sZeroBlog\data-default\users\content-default.json
data\Name'sZeroBlog\js.all
.3. Each user cant to put 1000 k character in this blog.
Explanation (French) :
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Vp5LH4wegCaqeB72yMw2jgNdVm4aR7ET/?Topic:10_1wsuQQPTH5Ysaryn5d2ZMZJApmv7WwZ3w)
FAQ : Zeroblog : http://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/content_json/?highlight=blog
Thx to all, to @nofish, @Erkan and all who work to ZeroNet

1_1wsuQQPTH5Ysaryn5d2ZMZJApmv7WwZ3w.body:
Thx to your speed answer .
Will be it better if Zeronet can to work with own tor ?

> [tonythefrench](#comment_1_1MEFyQ6EisGzSQ8VL8ZwQ7aug4x1iVvv9L): That's a good idea, I didn't know tribler software. I'm downloading it right now ;)  Have a nice day
Looool. I think you speak French and we talking both in English, Mdrrr. Norrrrmalll.
Give me your opinion about this program:-)

> [nofish](#comment_662_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Tor is a 15+ year old, most battle tested anonymity project. I'm highly doubt that we could create anything nearly as powerful as Tor.
If I understand, Tribler has no create a system as Tor. 
Is it possible to have a Zeronet with the system Tor, but only in ZeroNet (Clone Tor)?

> [nofish](#comment_664_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It could be possible, but it would be very easy to deanonymize anyone.but why? more node = more security
Maybe. How anonymity works on Tribler :
https://www.tribler.org/anonymity.html

1_1Erq7nnfVzp2PEJmANG2d5t7C4aX5iU3H1.body:
Sisi, des moteurs de recherche existent mais sont un peu basiques, par rapport Ã  Google :-)
Regarde par ici, sur le Wiki :
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Vp5LH4wegCaqeB72yMw2jgNdVm4aR7ET/?Topic:4_1wsuQQPTH5Ysaryn5d2ZMZJApmv7WwZ3w

2_1wsuQQPTH5Ysaryn5d2ZMZJApmv7WwZ3w.body:
> [nofish](#comment_671_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): if you modify the data\users\content.json file you need to sign it using the sidebar

It's True.I had make a mistake ?

> [nofish](#comment_672_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): working now!
Great ! Merci pour tout. Thx a lot
new link and it's work without problem
